channel.title: [317] OblivionPk Actual Release [317] Best Pking Server made
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Download Link - -[/size]
PvP Features -PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect -MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All GS specs and crossbow attack emote, Whip, D Claws.) -Green dragon PK'ing which is very active. -Every PVP Armor has been added, you can obtain these by getting your PK Points up -Wilderness Obelisk is now 100% -Fully working void armor (Mage/Range/Melee) All has an effect -Amazing PKING, one of the top i believe -Wilderness levels and alot of active PKers
Magic System I have been working alot with this system, and the results are awesome, we got- Instant Freeze Perfected AutoCast Perfect Mage Following More clearer GFXS Void Mage Works Protect Magic 100% Perfect Delays Every glitch has been fixed Made mage bonus alot better Mystic lore works 100% Perfect Rushing Updated that it registers that you're maging while in combat If switched to ancient staff / master wand u stop attacking to start maging easier
Range System I have also been working with this alot and are still working with it but we got this so far Dragon bolt (e) and diamond bolt (e) effects Dark bow has been perfected Added dragon arrows Rune and addy knifes is now added and perfected! Better delays Re-Made projectiles Better def/hit bonuses Rune knifes has been added Range Following is now 100% Avas backpack is fully working with its effect Added new range attack emote Correct Dbow GFX'S, Dbolt GFXS, Diamond bolt Gfxs Added correct Rune Cbow Stance/walk/run/attack emotes
Melee System I pretty much only added new emotes/gfxs, changed maxhits added a few armor, weapons and updated melee following New whip, GS, Anchor, Rune Defender, Dragon Claws, Emotes Anchor GFXS All Godsword GFXS including SS Piety, Chivarly, Ultimate strength all of these are perfected Special attacks are perfected Faster Specials Vengeance works 100% with the new emote + gfx Combat following is now much better then before Instant DDS Spec Dragon scimitar special attack has been fixed properly Zamorak spear with it actuall spec has been added
Player Vs. Monsters -1000 Exp per hit -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon -Slash Bash -Barrelchester -Kree'arra -General graador -Commander Zilyana -K'ril Tsutsaroth -Full Killcount NPCS and Miniones -Full Daganoths (DKS)
Boss Killing & Minigames -Godwars Dungeon with fully miniones, kill count, bosses (These drops armadyl,bandos,ss,d boots, hilts, shards and much more) -Kalphite Queen, This npc is just like runescape, it transfers to another npc once dead etc etc (Drops Dragon Claws) -King black dragon (Drops Visage & DFH) -Slash bash (Drops every spirit shield) -Barrelchester is a boss you can only solo which gives you an anchor once killed it -Daganoths (Drops Dragon Axe & Pickaxe) -Jad (Only 1 wave but you dont keep firecape on death) -Barrows (80% Chance in getting a barrows piece) -Assault (Havent really done much to this) -Pest Control (30 points for void, easy fast pc rounds) -Funpk (place were u can kill for fun?) - Added a new extremly fun minigame at castle wars / receive 500k each person you kill. - You can only range armadyl NPCS
Skilling Not sure if people actually like to skill on a private server but i've added a small little place for skilling aswell Every skill is working up to 90-100% Updated mining alot its pretty much 110% now i also added dragon pickaxe to it For more type :: skills in game
Other Features -Clipped Player Following -Fully Lunar book with correct Emotes/GFXS -Only a few customs such as dragon pickaxe/claws -Edgeville is the new home -Instant teleports -Teletabs works perfectly -Wildy Obelisk are now 100% -1000XP per hit -Perfect Economy -8.25GB Dedicated Server -Every Dupe has been fixed -Blocked Cheat Clients -Buy X/Trade X/Sell X/Bank X/Withraw X fully working -Clan Chat is working perfectly with correct colours, working on LS -Wonderfull staff, community -Loot goes to the one that does most damage -Drop Rate is perfected for the economy -Shops are selling more items now -Prayer is working 100% including draining -24/7 Server -Many major glitches has been fixed such as "Multi-Glitch" -We had a reset 2 weeks ago after 5-6 months uptime and not planing to reset anymore again so get started -Auto Retaliate has been fixed properly
Enjoy, NO CLIENT DONT ASK THANKS :] Rep If you want.

item.title: [317] OblivionPk Actual Release [317] Best Pking Server made
item.dc:creator: @sanity sanity
item.description:
@sanity wrote:

[size=24pt]Download Link - -[/size]

PvP Features
-PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect
-MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All GS specs and crossbow attack emote, Whip, D Claws.)
-Green dragon PK’ing which is very active.
-Every PVP Armor has been added, you can obtain these by getting your PK Points up
-Wilderness Obelisk is now 100%
-Fully working void armor (Mage/Range/Melee) All has an effect
-Amazing PKING, one of the top i believe
-Wilderness levels and alot of active PKers

Magic System
I have been working alot with this system, and the results are awesome, we got-
Instant Freeze
Perfected AutoCast
Perfect Mage Following
More clearer GFXS
Void Mage Works
Protect Magic 100%
Perfect Delays
Every glitch has been fixed
Made mage bonus alot better
Mystic lore works 100%
Perfect Rushing
Updated that it registers that you’re maging while in combat
If switched to ancient staff / master wand u stop attacking to start maging easier

Range System
I have also been working with this alot and are still working with it but we got this so far
Dragon bolt (e) and diamond bolt (e) effects
Dark bow has been perfected
Added dragon arrows
Rune and addy knifes is now added and perfected!
Better delays
Re-Made projectiles
Better def/hit bonuses
Rune knifes has been added
Range Following is now 100%
Avas backpack is fully working with its effect
Added new range attack emote
Correct Dbow GFX’S, Dbolt GFXS, Diamond bolt Gfxs
Added correct Rune Cbow Stance/walk/run/attack emotes

Melee System
I pretty much only added new emotes/gfxs, changed maxhits added a few armor, weapons and updated melee following
New whip, GS, Anchor, Rune Defender, Dragon Claws, Emotes
Anchor GFXS
All Godsword GFXS including SS
Piety, Chivarly, Ultimate strength all of these are perfected
Special attacks are perfected
Faster Specials
Vengeance works 100% with the new emote + gfx
Combat following is now much better then before
Instant DDS Spec
Dragon scimitar special attack has been fixed properly
Zamorak spear with it actuall spec has been added

Player Vs. Monsters
-1000 Exp per hit
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon
-Slash Bash
-Barrelchester
-Kree’arra
-General graador
-Commander Zilyana
-K’ril Tsutsaroth
-Full Killcount NPCS and Miniones
-Full Daganoths (DKS)

Boss Killing & Minigames
-Godwars Dungeon with fully miniones, kill count, bosses (These drops armadyl,bandos,ss,d boots, hilts, shards and much more)
-Kalphite Queen, This npc is just like runescape, it transfers to another npc once dead etc etc (Drops Dragon Claws)
-King black dragon (Drops Visage & DFH)
-Slash bash (Drops every spirit shield)
-Barrelchester is a boss you can only solo which gives you an anchor once killed it
-Daganoths (Drops Dragon Axe & Pickaxe)
-Jad (Only 1 wave but you dont keep firecape on death)
-Barrows (80% Chance in getting a barrows piece)
-Assault (Havent really done much to this)
-Pest Control (30 points for void, easy fast pc rounds)
-Funpk (place were u can kill for fun?)

  • Added a new extremly fun minigame at castle wars / receive 500k each person you kill.

You can only range armadyl NPCS

Skilling
Not sure if people actually like to skill on a private server but i’ve added a small little place for skilling aswell
Every skill is working up to 90-100%
Updated mining alot its pretty much 110% now i also added dragon pickaxe to it
For more type :: skills in game

Other Features
-Clipped Player Following
-Fully Lunar book with correct Emotes/GFXS
-Only a few customs such as dragon pickaxe/claws
-Edgeville is the new home
-Instant teleports
-Teletabs works perfectly
-Wildy Obelisk are now 100%
-1000XP per hit
-Perfect Economy
-8.25GB Dedicated Server
-Every Dupe has been fixed
-Blocked Cheat Clients
-Buy X/Trade X/Sell X/Bank X/Withraw X fully working
-Clan Chat is working perfectly with correct colours, working on LS
-Wonderfull staff, community
-Loot goes to the one that does most damage
-Drop Rate is perfected for the economy
-Shops are selling more items now
-Prayer is working 100% including draining
-24/7 Server
-Many major glitches has been fixed such as “Multi-Glitch”
-We had a reset 2 weeks ago after 5-6 months uptime and not planing to reset anymore again so get started
-Auto Retaliate has been fixed properly

Enjoy, NO CLIENT DONT ASK THANKS :]
Rep If you want.

Read full topic
